My First Post

August 14, 2016

I just made this blog and I'm playing around with all the css and html properties, trying to have fun, and see what crazy things I can come up with. Hopefully, eventually, I can improve me css and html skills and make this blog look legit. I think I will continue working on this for a while, and see what I can come up with over the next few weeks. As of right now, it looks terrible.

Should I change this to a md file? I'll ask around and think about it.
